product_details.about_the_\"men_3-stripe_logo_detail_tra: Get ready to move in style with the Adidas tracksuit featuring a stand-up collar for that sleek, sporty look. Made from 100% recycled materials, this tracksuit offers a comfortable, breathable fit thats perfect for warm-ups, cool-downs, or casual outings. The stand-up collar adds an extra touch of athletic flair, while the soft, flexible fabric ensures you stay comfortable no matter the activity. Whether youre hitting the track, heading to the gym, or just lounging, this tracksuit delivers both style and performance in one sharp package.

product_details.adidas_originals_men_samba_og_leather_sn: Whether heading to the pitch or the streets, the adidas Samba OG shoes keep your style on point. Their iconic gum sole and suede accents have propelled the Samba into fashion fame. Smooth leather envelops the foot in retro comfort as the serrated 3-Stripes add a flash of contrast. Reinforced toes stand up to the spontaneous kick-arounds, and the textile lining keeps things comfortable. From the archives but always looking ahead, the Samba OG continues redefining casual cool 70 years on.

product_details.about adidas_originals_men_leather_samba: Embrace the timeless classic of adidas with the Samba OG Shoes for men. With a history that spans from football pitches to skate parks, these shoes offer an iconic silhouette in wearable colours and premium materials. The synthetic leather upper and rubber outsole ensure durability, while the lace closure offers a secure fit. Made with LWG & preferred materials, these shoes are not just about style but also sustainability.

product_details.about adidas_women_drop_step_low_2.0_eve: The Drop Step Low 2.0 draws from the rich heritage of the adidas basketball franchise to fashion a lifestyle shoe that blurs the lines between classic and contemporary. Textured suede and smooth synthetic leather combine throughout the upper in a multilayered masterwork that combines the beautiful chunkiness of '80s hoops style with today's fashion mindset. A smooth lining gives the fit its fabulous feel, and the retooled sole effortlessly blends traction, stability and cushioning to keep your motion on point. Fashion leggings and loose, baggy jeans both look great with this archive-inspired staple.
